Uses of Class
ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.Controller

Packages that use Controller
ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers Provides a controlled interface to the various styling objects. 
 

Uses of Controller in ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers
 

Subclasses of Controller in ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers
 class BackboneStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the backbone style.
 class GlobalStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the global style.
 class LabelStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the label styles.
 class LegendStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the legend styles.
 class PlotStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling all access to the plot style by GUI elements.
 class PropertyMapperController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the property mappers.
 class RulerStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the ruler style.
 class SetStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the feature holder styles.
 class SlotStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the slot styles.
 class StyleController
          This class is responsible for managing meta-level information regarding all the style controllers.
 class TooltipStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the tool tip style.
